public class Roomba extends robocode.AdvancedRobot
Roomba! - Happily tries to wipe every enemy.

Drives at robots trying to ram them. Fires when very close to the enemy. Dances upon winning.

Author:
Jo√£o Guedes - up202203859, Ricardo Figueiredo - up202105430

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Main loop of the robot. Sets the colors and continuously scans for enemies.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class robocode.Robot

    • onScannedRobot

      public void onScannedRobot(robocode.ScannedRobotEvent e)
      Called when an enemy is scanned by the radar.

      Roomba proceeds to run to the enemy. Radar locks on to the enemy. Roomba never looses track of the enemy.

      Specified by:
      onScannedRobot in interface robocode.robotinterfaces.IBasicEvents
      Overrides:
      onScannedRobot in class robocode.Robot
      Parameters:
      e - The event containing the scanned robot's details.

    • onWin

      public void onWin(robocode.WinEvent e)
      Executes a dance upon winning a match. The robot wiggles left and right.
      Specified by:
      onWin in interface robocode.robotinterfaces.IBasicEvents
      Overrides:
      onWin in class robocode.Robot
      Parameters:
      e - The event signaling the win.
